title.rendered: Frank Ferro reports on waste pickers for the South African Broadcasting Coporation

content.rendered: The South African Broadcasting Corporation’s segment documents the impact of privatisation of recycling on the waste picker community in South Africa and provides an illuminating discussion on how the waste picker community are treated in society.
